articles.description: Kia has sold 2 lakh cars in India in just 17 months to become the fastest carmaker to reach this milestone. Kia sales in India had crossed the 1 lakh mark in July 2020. The next 1 lakh units were sold in a record period of 6 months. Kia currently offers three…
articles.content:
Kia has sold 2 lakh cars in India in just 17 months to become the fastest carmaker to reach this milestone.

articles.author: Harsha Jethmalani
articles.title: Paint makers get a taste of their own medicine as Grasim enters their turf - Mint
articles.description: Grasim says it will invest a massive  ₹5,000 cr in the next three years and is eyeing the second spot in the paints sector
articles.content: Grasim Industries Ltds shares rose as much as 11% at one point on Monday, after the company announced its foray into the paints sector. Stocks of paint companies such as Asian Paints Ltd and Berger P… [+3134 chars]
